SA20bsu060_u:7: asti karma alpāyuḥsaṃvartanīyamiti karmagatiryathānyāyaṃ vistareṇa vibhaktāḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:13: nanu bhagavatā sūtramuktamekottarike - yāvanto bhikṣavaḥ sattvā apadā vā dvipadā vā catuṣpadā vā bahupadā vā,
SA20bsu060_u:14: tathāgatasteṣāṃ sattvānāmagrata ākhyāyate yadidamarhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ iti vistaraḥ / gāthā coktā -
SA20bsu060_u:24: ye tu mithyādarśanopahatacittāḥ, yathā - buddhasya parinirvṛtasya stūpe dattasya phalaṃ kutaḥ?
SA20bsu060_u:29: api ca sarve 'pi guṇā eteṣvevāntargatāḥ ucyante /
SA20bsu060_u:30: kathaṃ punarbhagavati kṛtaḥ prasādo 'cintya iti? ucyate /
SA20bsu060_u:31: yathā atraiva karmavibhaṅge uktam, evamanyeṣu sūtrānteṣu /
SA20bsu060_u:39: tathā ca aniruddhaprabhṛtīnāṃ caikapiṇḍapātapradānena cakravartirājyaṃ sapta devarājyāni paścime ca bhave 'rhattvaṃ ca prāptam /
SA20bsu060_u:43_0: yathoktaṃ bhagavatā abhidharme bālakāṇḍasūtre - ekacittaprasādasya vipāko varṇitaḥ
SA20bsu060_u:43_1: - yadi ānanda saṃsāre saṃsarataḥ ekacittaprasādasya vipākena saptakṛtvaḥ paranirmitavaśavartiṣu (KVU, Vaidya 213)
SA20bsu060_u:46: saptakṛtvo yāmeṣu deveṣu bhūtvā rājyaṃ kārayati /
SA20bsu060_u:50: yadi na rājyaṃ tata idamekacittaprasādasya phalam /
SA20bsu060_u:52: yathā dīpaṃkareṇa buddhena dīpamālāyāḥ pradānena buddhatvaṃ prāptam /
SA20bsu060_u:54: evaṃrūpāṇi karmāṇi, yāni loke na praśraddadhati /
SA20bsu060_u:58: uktaṃ ca yathā brāhmaṇasūtre - agro 'haṃ hi brāhmaṇaśreṣṭho loke /
SA20bsu060_u:60: yathā ca bhagavān koṭusya maharṣeḥ śelasya ca tāpasasya vinayārthamāśramaṃ gataḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:64: rājā mukhaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ nadīnāṃ sāgaro mukham //
SA20bsu060_u:78: yathā ca bhagavatā etadagre dakṣiṇāvibhaṅge sūtra uktam - etadagramānanda pratipudgalikānāṃ dakṣiṇīyānāṃ yadidaṃ tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:80: yathā ca mahāsamājīye parinirvāṇādisūtreṣu dvādaśayojaniko devānāṃ saṃnipātaḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:82: mahāprātihāryaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā anekāni tīrthakaraśatāni pravrajitāni /
SA20bsu060_u:87: evaṃ devānāṃ ye 'gryā manuṣyāṇāṃ ca, te 'bhiprasannā bhagavati /
SA20bsu060_u:89: api ca yathaikottarikāgratāsūtra uktam - agradharmasamanvāgato devabhūtamanuṣyāgryaḥ prāptaḥ pramoditaḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:92: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ pūrvamapi bodhisattvabhūtaṃ devā upasaṃkrāntāḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:93: yathā govindasūtre, śatavarge ca tāpasasūtre indra upasaṃkrāntaḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:94: nanu tadā agradharmasamanvāgataḥ, sāṃprataṃ nirvāṇagāmī mārgo 'dhigataḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:97: kecidāhuḥ - (KVU, Vaidya 214) buddhaḥ parinirvṛto mokṣaṃ prāptaḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:98: tasya yat stūpe dattaṃ pratimāyāṃ vā dhūpapuṣpādikaṃ kaḥ pratigṛhṇātiḥ?
SA20bsu060_u:100: aśraddhaitadvākyam, purato vā pāpataram, yeṣāṃ buddhaśāsanasiddhānto na viditaḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:101: ya eṣa dharmo bhagavatā diśataḥ, etadbhagavataḥ śarīram /
SA20bsu060_u:105: kiṃ kāraṇam? dharmaśarīraṃ bhagavataḥ śarīraṃ pāramārthikam /
SA20bsu060_u:106: tena dharmeṇa yadā deśitena srotāpattiphalaṃ prāpsyate,
SA20bsu060_u:121: yathā mahāparinirvāṇasūtre uktam - syādevamānanda yuṣmākaṃ parinirvṛto bhagavān /
SA20bsu060_u:129: tathā na kiṃcinmātāpitṛsaṃbhavena śarīreṇa kāryaṃ kriyate /
SA20bsu060_u:131: yadāhaṃ gṛha āvāsavasitaḥ, na tadā mayā kaściddharmo 'bhisaṃbuddhaḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:134: ye duḥkhena dharmamicchanti te duṣkaracaryayā vismāpitāḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:139: paścānmayā bhojanaṃ bhuktaṃ śarīrabalaṃ ca prāpya vaiśākhamāsapūrṇapañcadaśyāṃ bodhimūle niṣaṇṇenānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ prāptā /
SA20bsu060_u:145: bhagavantaṃ bhagavato mātṛṣvasāha - jīvantu bhavanta bhaga - - - - - - /
SA20bsu060_u:146: yattu bhagavatoktam - - - - na te 'haṃ gautami pureva vaktavyaḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:147: sāha - atha kathaṃ bhagavān vaktavyaḥ? bhagavānāha - evaṃ vaktavyam - dī(rgharātraṃ bhagava)
SA20bsu060_u:149: etaddarśayati - na mama mātāpitṛsaṃbhavena śarīreṇa kiṃcinniṣṭhā /
SA20bsu060_u:152: yāni mayā saṃsāre duṣkarasahasrāṇi kṛtāni, tānyatīva dharmasyārthāya /
SA20bsu060_u:153: anenāpi kāraṇena ya eva bhagavataḥ śarīraṃ - - - /
SA20bsu060_u:157: divyāni - - - - - - nanda evaṃ tathāgataḥ satkṛto bhavati gurukṛto mānito vā pūjito vā /
SA20bsu060_u:158: yaḥ punaḥ kaścidānanda mama śāsane 'pramatto viharati,
SA20bsu060_u:160: tenāhaṃ satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito bhavāmi /
SA20bsu060_u:163: (taṃ ca) śarīrapūjā kṛtā, na dharmo dhāritaḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:170: mahāparinivāṇe āryānandaḥ pṛcchati - kathamasmābhirbhagavati parinirvṛte bhagavaccharīrapratipattiḥ kāryā?
SA20bsu060_u:172: upāsakāḥ śarīraṃ yathā jñāsyanti, tathā kariṣyanti /
SA20bsu060_u:177: yathā ca devāvatārasūtre utpalavarṇābhikṣuṇyā cakravartirūpaṃ nirmāya bhagavān devalokāvatīrṇaḥ prathamaṃ vanditaḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:181: etaddarśayati - na mātāpitṛsaṃbhavena śarīreṇa varṇitena vandito bhavāmi /
SA20bsu060_u:186: anenāpi kāraṇena dharma eva bhagavataḥ śarīram /
SA20bsu060_u:188: atha paścimeṣu janapadeṣu dvau bhikṣū prativasataḥ sakhāyau /
SA20bsu060_u:197: sa tṛṣārto bhagavantaṃ namaskurvan kālagataḥ, prasannacittaśca deveṣūpapannaḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:198: dvitīyo bhikṣuḥ sapramāṇakaṃ pānīyaṃ pītvā anupūrveṇa bahubhirdivasairbhagavataḥ samīpaṃ gataḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:199: sa ca deveṣūpapanno bhikṣuḥ pūrvaṃ gataḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:200: yena saprāṇakaṃ pānīyaṃ pītaḥ tasya bhikṣorbhagavatā mātāpitṛsaḥbhavaḥ śarīraḥ darśitam - etanmama śarīraḥ paśya /
SA20bsu060_u:201: sa ca devalokopapanno bhikṣurbhagavatoktaḥ - darśaya śarīraḥ te /
SA20bsu060_u:203: sa bhikṣuḥ saḥvignaḥ pṛcchati - bhagavan, kimidam?
SA20bsu060_u:204: bhagavānāha - ya eṣa devaputro 'nena tṛṣṇārtena saprāṇakamudakaḥ na pītam /
SA20bsu060_u:206: eṣa dvitīyo mātāpitṛsaḥbhavaḥ śarīraḥ draṣṭukāmaḥ sapraṇākaḥ pānīyaḥ pītvā etasya mayā mātāpitṛsaḥbhavaḥ śarīraḥ darśitam - etaccharīraḥ paśya /
SA20bsu060_u:207: yadyanena kaścidguṇo na dṛṣṭaḥ, tena ca mātāpitṛsaḥbhavametaccharīraḥ dṛṣṭam, na tenāhaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:210: aparādhena tiṣṭhanti na te buddhasya sāntike //
SA20bsu060_u:211: yojanānāṃ sahasreṣu ye śrutvā na subhāṣitam /
SA20bsu060_u:212: tadarthaṃ pratipadyanti te vai buddhasya sāntike //
SA20bsu060_u:213: yathā ca bhagavān dharmaprītyarthaṃ nandakasya bhikṣādharmaśrāvaṇāyopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:217: evaṃ navāṅgaśāsanaṃ yo mama dhārayati, taṃ mārgayata /
SA20bsu060_u:218: na mātāpitṛsaṃbhavasya (KVU, Vaidya 216) śarīrasya upasthāpakaṃ mārgayata /
SA20bsu060_u:220: yathoktaṃ ṛddhipādanipāte mṛgāramātuḥ prāsāde - evaṃ bhāviteṣu bhikṣavastathāgataścaturṣu ṛddhipādeṣu kalpaṃ vā tiṣṭhet kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā /
SA20bsu060_u:221: etaddarśayati - na yūyaṃ samarthā mama śarīraṃ kalpaṃ vā dhārayitum /
SA20bsu060_u:224: yathā ca mahādevasūtre uktam - mā mama bhaviṣyatha paścima - - - - /
SA20bsu060_u:241: vyaktā vinītā viśāradā bahuśrutā dhārmikā dharmārthapratipannāḥ saṃghaṃ śobhayanti /
SA20bsu060_u:245: yathoktamugrasūtre - paśyogra bhikṣuḥ cīvareṇa prāvṛtenāpramāṇaṃ samādhimupasaṃpadya viharati /
SA20bsu060_u:249: tadyathogra gṛhapate saṃbahulā mahānadya ekībhāvaṃ gacchanti /
SA20bsu060_u:251: atha ca punaraprameyo 'saṃkhyeyo mahānudakaskandhaḥ iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchanti /
SA20bsu060_u:252: katamā mahānadyaḥ? gaṅgā yamunā sarayū āryavatī mahī /
SA20bsu060_u:254: atha ca punaraprameyo 'saṃkhyeyo mahānudakaskandhaḥ saṃkhyāṃ gacchanti /
SA20bsu060_u:255: evamevogra paśya bhikṣuḥ cīvaraṃ paribhuñjannapramāṇaṃ samādhimupasaṃpadya viharati /
SA20bsu060_u:258: evameva pudgale 'pi tāvacchīlavati asmākaṃ dattamaprameyaphalaṃ bhavati /
SA20bsu060_u:261: tathā parinirvṛtasya bhagavataḥ stūpe kṛtāyāḥ pūjāyā aprameyo vipākaḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:265: sa mahābhogavattāṃ vā prārthayan dānaṃ dadāti,
SA20bsu060_u:272: asti karma asmākaṃ yaḥ stūpe dattamapaharati, tasyāparimāṇaṃ pāpam /
SA20bsu060_u:278: eṣo 'smākaṃ siddhāntaḥ - yatstūpe dattaṃ tatstūpe eva yojyam /
SA20bsu060_u:282: kathaṃ punarbāhyā ye devāsteṣāṃ datte kiṃ puṇyaṃ phalate? (KVU, Vaidya 217) evaṃ saṃpratipannāḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:285: evaṃ ca brūmaḥ - yastiṣṭhati yadeva bhaktā vā dhūpaṃ vā puṣpaṃ vā gandhaṃ vā dīpaṃ vā bhojanaṃ vā vastraṃ vā alaṃkāraṃ vā hiraṇyaṃ vā suvarṇaṃ vā prayacchanti,
SA20bsu060_u:287: atha na pratigṛhṇāti, buddhasya teṣāṃ ca kaḥ prativiśeṣaḥ?
SA20bsu060_u:288: atha matam - devānāṃ vā arcāsteṣāṃ pratikṛtayaḥ pūjyante /
SA20bsu060_u:291: pratimāsu ye dhūpaṃ gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ pratiyacchanti /
SA20bsu060_u:297: uktaṃ bhagavatā - trayāṇāṃ samavāyena dakṣiṇā mahāphalā bhavati /
SA20bsu060_u:298: yadi tāvaddātā bhavati, yacca dravyaṃ dātavyaṃ hiraṇyasuvarṇādi tacca bhavati, ye dakṣiṇīyāḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:301: na dānapratidānaṃ hastena hastaṃ dattaṃ mahāphalaṃ bhavati /
SA20bsu060_u:302: yadyastyeva, kiṃ ca na pratigṛhṇanti? tadbhaktānām /
SA20bsu060_u:304: atha na pratigṛhṇanti, kiṃ kṛtvā? atha yuktaṃ ca bhaktānāmevaṃ krodhaḥ kāraṇam /
SA20bsu060_u:305: atha teṣāṃ satyaṃ nāsmākaṃ devaḥ kruddha iti /
SA20bsu060_u:307: yadi na kruddhāḥ, kimarthaṃ na pratigṛhṇanti? tasmānnāsti saḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:309: yacca teṣāṃ devānāṃ devabhaktāḥ suvarṇaṃ hiraṇyaṃ vā pādamūle prayacchanti,
SA20bsu060_u:310: evaṃ devasya ko bandho vā iti /
SA20bsu060_u:311: tadyadi tasya dhūpeṣu puṣpeṣu gandheṣu vā mālyakare vopayujyate /
SA20bsu060_u:313: atha taddravyamanyaireva gṛhītam, yo dātā tasya puṇyaphalaṃ nāsti /
SA20bsu060_u:314: ye ca gṛhṇanti vayaṃ devabhaktā devapādopajīvinaḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:316: teṣāmadattadevaiśvarye devadravyāpahāre kiṃ kāraṇam? devadravyamanyena grāhyam /
SA20bsu060_u:317: iha devasya samo vā dravyaṃ gṛhyet prativiśiṣṭo vā?
SA20bsu060_u:318: na ca devasya kaścittulyaḥ, prāgeva viśiṣṭataraśca /
SA20bsu060_u:320: kiṃ kāraṇam? yasmātte tasya praṇipātaṃ kurvanti /
SA20bsu060_u:322: yadā te viśiṣṭatarāḥ, kimarthaṃ devaḥ prasādyate?
SA20bsu060_u:327: atha mātā pitā putro rājā bhṛtyaḥca yathādravyaṃ yathāpaitryaṃ dravyaṃ putro gṛhṇāti /
SA20bsu060_u:328: bhṛtyo vā rājño dravyaṃ gṛhṇāti, tathā vayamapi /
SA20bsu060_u:330: kiṃ kāraṇam? putrasya tu piturdravyaṃ gṛhṇato mahān pātakaḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:333: rājā adattānāṃ gṛhṇamāṇaṃ putraṃ ca piotā ca dadyāt pitā, prāgeva bhṛtyam /
SA20bsu060_u:335: yaccaivaṃ saṃpratipannāḥ - vayaṃ devabhaktāstatpādopajīvinaśca, tasmādgṛhṇīma iti /
SA20bsu060_u:337: kiṃ kāraṇam? na ca devabhaktāste devadravyaṃ gṛhṇanti /
SA20bsu060_u:338: atha gṛhṇanti, na te tadbhaktā bhavanti /
SA20bsu060_u:342: na teṣāṃ kiṃcitpāpaṃ na vidyate, ye 'dattaṃ gṛhṇanti /
SA20bsu060_u:343: kiṃ kāraṇam? pūrvarṣibhirmūle chinne tapovṛkṣaśākhāyāṃ yasya luptapitṛsnehastasyetaro janaḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:344: etaduktaṃ bhavati - yo 'dattaṃ devadravyaṃ gṛhṇāti, na tasya kiṃcidakaraṇīyam /
SA20bsu060_u:345: kiṃ kāraṇam? (KVU, Vaidya 218) na te bhaktimantaḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:346: atha te bhaktimantaḥ, śatravaḥ ke khyāpitā devasya?
SA20bsu060_u:347: atha matam - yathā amamāstena teṣāṃ dravyaṃ na prayojanam /
SA20bsu060_u:349: asti keṣāṃciddevānāṃ śrutiryathā devayajñavidhvaṃsanaṃ pṛthivyā apahāraśca kṛta iti /
SA20bsu060_u:350: kasmātte 'mamā na bhavanti? asmādasmākameva dattaṃ na devasya /
SA20bsu060_u:355: kimarthaṃ devena sa dātā noktaḥ - eṣāṃ prayaccha, eṣāṃ datto - - - - bhaviṣyāmīti /
SA20bsu060_u:356: yasmāddātā devena noktaḥ, taiśca gṛhītam, tasmāddātuḥ puṇyaphalaṃ nāsti /
SA20bsu060_u:358: atha matam - devasya puṇye ca - - - - taccāyuktam /
SA20bsu060_u:359: kiṃ kāraṇam? yasmāddevena tad dravyaṃ svayameva gṛhya hastena hastaṃ teṣāṃ na pratipāditam /
SA20bsu060_u:360: yathoktaṃ bhagavatā - trayāṇāṃ samavāyena dakṣiṇā mahāphalā bhavatyeveti /
SA20bsu060_u:361: evaṃ kiṃ na dattam? evaṃ caite viśiṣṭāḥ samānādeva /
SA20bsu060_u:366: etāni devānāṃ ca devabhaktānāṃ ca devadharmasya pa - - - - - kāni /
SA20bsu060_u:367: adyāpi cātra bhūtaṃ vaktavyametattāvaddevasya tīrthayātramapi teṣāṃ kaḥ pratigṛhṇati /
SA20bsu060_u:368: tāsāṃ ca nadīnāṃ ca kūlāni viśālāni pā - - - - kālagatāḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:370: atha matam - nadyāṃ snāyāmastīrthamuddiśya asyā nadyāstasmāttīrtha - - - - - yate /
SA20bsu060_u:372: kiṃ kāraṇam? asmākaṃ buddhasya śarīraṃ tiṣṭhati /
SA20bsu060_u:375: - - - - tā nadyaḥ paurāṇamārgamutsṛjya anena pṛthivīpradeśena vahanti /
SA20bsu060_u:378: evaṃvidhameva ye ṛṣīṇāṃ te brahmarṣiṇāṃ pūjāprabhṛtayaḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:389: vayaṃ brūmaḥ - pūrvakālato devaparīkṣitā idaṃ pāpataramaśrotavyaṃ ca /
SA20bsu060_u:390: kiṃ kāraṇam? ye kicana sattvā dvipadā catuṣpadā vā, teṣāṃ yonimukhānnirgamaḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:394: evaṃ ca - - - - sarve mukhata eva jātāḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:395: kathamekapuruṣeṇa varṇacatuṣṭayaṃ jātam? yadi ca cāturvarṇyaṃ prajāpatinā jātam /
SA20bsu060_u:396: ete varṇāścaṇḍālamleccha - - - - yaśca kutaḥ prādurbhūtāḥ? tathā hastigavāśvādayaḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:397: kiṃ kāraṇam? eṣāmatra nāmagrahaṇaṃ na kṛtam /
SA20bsu060_u:403: yasmādeteṣāṃ ca nāmagrahaṇaṃ na kṛtam, tena prabhūtatarā mṛgapakṣiprabhṛtayaḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:413: evaṃ kṣatriyasyaiva vaiśyasya (KVU, Vaidya 219) śūdrasya prathamaḥ putro brāhmaṇaḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:420: yathā prajāpateścaturvarṇam, evaṃ tasya putrāṇāṃ gotrāṇāṃ ca caturvarṇaṃ bhaviṣyati /
SA20bsu060_u:421: atha brāhmaṇānāṃ putrāḥ sarve brāhmaṇāḥ, tasmātprajāpateste tu viśiṣṭatarāḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:422: yadi ca te prativiśiṣṭatarāḥ prajāpatinā, kiṃ prayojanam?
SA20bsu060_u:423: atha matam - prajāpatinā brāhmaṇā nyūnatarā iti /
SA20bsu060_u:425: yāvadbrahmaṇaputrī brāhmaṇī yadyasya mukhato jātā, tasmādagamyā /
SA20bsu060_u:431: yasmāduktam - brahmaṇedaṃ jagatsṛṣṭaṃ lokeśvaranirmitaṃ prajāpatikṛtaṃ ceti /
SA20bsu060_u:434: atha matam - sahitā bhūtvā prajā nirmiṇanti, tadapyayuktam /
SA20bsu060_u:435: kiṃ kāraṇam? te pratisāmantarājāno yathānyonyāhaṃkārāḥ - ahaṃ kartā, ahaṃ karteti / yathoktam -
SA20bsu060_u:437: aśāśvatasya cittasya te nirmāyuḥ kathaṃ prajāḥ //
SA20bsu060_u:438: evaṃ te sahitā bhūtvā asamarthāḥ prajānirmāṇe /
SA20bsu060_u:441: atha matam - adyāpi sāvakāśam, yasmānnāmagrahaṇaṃ na kṛtam /
SA20bsu060_u:444: kiṃ kāraṇam? ekasya doṣe datte śeṣā doṣā bhavanti /
SA20bsu060_u:445: etaduktaṃ bhavati - yadi tava brāhmaṇārthaṃ saha kathāṃ kuryāt, sa tasya doṣo dātavyaḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:449: yadevamāsṛtya śūdraḥ kathāṃ kuryāt saha vaktavyam /
SA20bsu060_u:450: tasmādayaṃ doṣaḥ ityevaṃ niravakāśaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati /
SA20bsu060_u:459: katamāni trīṇi? mātṛgrāmaḥ kūṭakārṣāpaṇo brāhmaṇānāṃ siddhāntaḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:463: yānyetāni parīkṣākāraṇāni devapūjāprajāpatiprabhṛtīnāṃ sadā kāryamadhikṛtya bhagavatoktam - brāhmaṇānāṃ siddhāntaḥ pracchannavāhī /
SA20bsu060_u:471: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /
SA20bsu060_u:472: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
SA20bsu060_u:477: yādṛśaṃ pustakaṃ dṛṣṭvā tādṛśaṃ likhitaṃ mayā /
SA20bsu060_u:478: yadi śuddhamaśuddhaṃ vā mama doṣo na vidyate //
SA20bsu060_u:486: yajamānaśriyaṃ brūmo yā śṛṅgāṅgalage śrīśrī ṣaḍakṣarīmahāvihāre śākyabhikṣuśrī mama likhyate //
